What is the difference between porcelain tile and ceramic tile?

{Porcelain tile|Porcelain flooring|Tile made of porcelain} is {typically|usually|commonly} denser and {less porous|more impervious} than {ceramic tile|ceramic flooring|tiles made of ceramic}. {This|These characteristics|These properties} {makes|make|make it} {it|porcelain tile} {more durable|sturdier|longer-lasting} and {less susceptible|more resistant} to {staining|stains} and {moisture damage|water damage}. {Due to|Because of|Thanks to} its {low|minimal|limited} porosity, {porcelain tile|porcelain flooring|tile made of porcelain} is also {less likely|not as prone} to {harbor|harbor and promote|host} {bacteria|microbes} and {mold|mildew}.

{Porcelain tile|Porcelain flooring|Tile made of porcelain} is {crafted|manufactured|produced} from a {refined|high-quality|premium} clay material that is {fired|kiln-fired|baked} at a {higher|greater|elevated} temperature than {ceramic tile|ceramic flooring|tiles made of ceramic}. {This|This manufacturing process|These conditions} {results in|produces|yields} a {harder|more rigid|tougher}, {more dense|less porous|denser} tile that is {less porous|less absorbent} and more {resistant|immune} to {wear and tear|damage from use}. {Porcelain tile|Porcelain flooring|Tile made of porcelain} is an {ideal|excellent|optimal} {choice|option|selection} for {high-traffic areas|areas with heavy foot traffic|locations with frequent foot traffic} such as {entryways|entrances}, {kitchens|cooking areas}, and {bathrooms|baths}.

{Ceramic tile|Ceramic flooring|Tiles made of ceramic} is {crafted|manufactured|produced} from a {natural|raw|organic} clay material that is {fired|kiln-fired|baked} at a {lower|reduced|lesser} temperature than {porcelain tile|porcelain flooring|tiles made of porcelain}. {This|This manufacturing process|These conditions} {results in|produces|yields} a {softer|softer-textured|more yielding}, {more porous|more absorbent} tile that is {more susceptible|prone} to {staining|stains} and {moisture damage|water damage}. {Ceramic tile|Ceramic flooring|Tiles made of ceramic} is {a good|an appropriate|a suitable} {choice|option|selection} for {low-traffic areas|areas with light foot traffic|locations with infrequent foot traffic} such as {bedrooms|sleeping areas} and {living rooms|family rooms}.
